imdb.plot outline: Diamond in the Ruff is a South African model search reality show. The show features a cast of judges and fairy godmothers - experts in the beauty, magazine and modeling industry- who combined forces to groom 15 young women from inexperienced candidates into accomplished models. The candidates were both plus and slim models. The castings took place across 8 South African towns and cities.
imdb.title: Diamond in the Ruff
plot: _Diamond in the Ruff_ (qv) is a South African model search reality show. The show features a cast of judges and fairy godmothers - experts in the beauty, magazine and modeling industry- who combined forces to groom 15 young women from inexperienced candidates into accomplished models. The candidates were both plus and slim models. The castings took place across 8 South African towns and cities.::Jack
